text: Ciriaco Luigi De Mita (; 2 February 1928 â€“ 26 May 2022) was an Italian politician. He served as the 47th Prime Minister of Italy from 1988 to 1989. He was as Member of the European Parliament from 2009 to 2013. De Mita died on 26 May 2022, at the age of 94, while recovering from surgery for a broken a femur after having a fall at his Avellino home. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian mayors Category:MEPs for Italy Category:Prime ministers of Italy Category:Politicians from Campania
title: Ciriaco De Mita
